name: 2D Platformer Demo (QuickfireMelody)
description:
This is my tutorial submission for the 2D platformer project.

Intended Modifications:

  1. Add and design Level 3
  2. Add and design Level 4
  3. Give the player a short range attack
  4. If possible, rework enemy AI to avoid plummeting to their death
  5. If possible, add collapsible platforms

Credits:

This game was created by Cormac Roth.

Assets provided by Brian Winn.
